content.en: SDN Algorithm Optimization: Researchers have been exploring various ways to improve the performance and efficiency of software-defined networking (SDN) systems. They have developed algorithms such as Predictor, Heuristic algorithm, K Similar Greedy Tree (KSGT), ESDN, and many others to address issues like performance interference, traffic engineering optimization, load balancing, traffic scheduling, congestion control, and more. These algorithms aim to enhance the capabilities of SDN networks and make them more efficient in managing network traffic and resources.
content.da: SDN-algoritmeoptimering: Forskere har udforsket forskellige måder at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af softwaredefinerede netværk (SDN) systemer. De har udviklet algoritmer som Predictor, Heuristisk algoritme, K Similar Greedy Tree (KSGT), ESDN, og mange andre for at adressere problemer som præstationsforstyrrelser, trafikingeniør-optimering, belastningsbalancering, trafiksplanlægning, kongestionskontrol og mere. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre kapaciteten af SDN-netværk og gøre dem mere effektive i håndtering af netværkstrafik og ressourcer.
